item.description: This website is my way of playing with new web stacks. The current iteration is written in Hugo, which was ridiculously easy to setup and host through GitHub.

Here is a condensed timeline of relevant events in my life, in reverse chronological order: Currently working as a software engineer on Instagram video chat (yes, you can video chat in IG!): rotational engineering grad; iOS in Swift and Objective-C; bugging my coworkers to accessibility test their features; mentoring new hires through bootcamp Worked as a consultant developer at ThoughtWorks: writing Java, React and Kotlin; evangelizing agile, pairing, and test-driven development; getting on a plane twice a week and living out of a suitcase Graduated with a major in neurobiology from Northwestern University, dabbled in computer science, psychology, classics, global health, and engineering along the way, and spent a semester in Paris studying French and the history of the European Union Learned the basics of HTML to make my Neopets page look good
